{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Chartered Accountant",
  "description": "Excellent Jobs is a consulting and recruitment firm, dedicated to hiring and managing great talents for its clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Chartered Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	We are seeking a Chartered Accountant to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in accounting, finance, and taxation.
	This role requires excellent analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to provide financial advice and support to clients and stakeholders.


Responsibilities


	Prepare and review financial statements, reports, and tax returns for individuals, businesses, and organizations.
	Provide tax planning, compliance, and advisory services to clients, including tax calculations, estimates, and filings.
	Perform audits, reviews, and evaluations of financial records and transactions to ensure accuracy, legality, and compliance with regulations.
	Analyze financial data, trends, and performance metrics to identify opportunities for improvement and risk mitigation.
	Develop and implement financial strategies, plans, and policies to support business objectives and goals.
	Advise clients on financial planning, investment strategies, and wealth management to optimize financial performance and outcomes.
	Collaborate with internal teams, including finance, legal, and operations, to provide financial guidance and support for business initiatives and projects.
	Stay updated on accounting principles, regulations, and industry standards to ensure compliance and best practices.
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling activities to support decision-making and planning processes.
	Maintain accurate and organized financial records, documents, and databases.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor`s or Master&#39;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related fields
	Minimum experience of 8 years above.
	Certified Public Accountant (CPA) or Chartered Accountant (CA) designation.
	Proven experience in accounting, auditing, taxation, or financial advisory services.
	Strong understanding of accounting principles, financial reporting standards, and tax laws.
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to communicate complex financial concepts effectively to clients and stakeholders.
	Proficiency in accounting software, financial management tools, and Microsoft Office suite.
	Integrity and professionalism in handling confidential financial information and client relationships.
	Adaptability and willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and regulations.
	Attention to detail and accuracy in work.


Salary
N300,000 - N500,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to:&nbsp;excellentjobs95@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted after the close of application.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },

    }

Chartered Accountant Job at Excellent Jobs




        
    

        
        Excellent Jobs is a consulting and recruitment firm, dedicated to hiring and managing great talents for its clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chartered Accountant

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a Chartered Accountant to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in accounting, finance, and taxation.
	This role requires excellent analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to provide financial advice and support to clients and stakeholders.


Responsibilities


	Prepare and review financial statements, reports, and tax returns for individuals, businesses, and organizations.
	Provide tax planning, compliance, and advisory services to clients, including tax calculations, estimates, and filings.
	Perform audits, reviews, and evaluations of financial records and transactions to ensure accuracy, legality, and compliance with regulations.
	Analyze financial data, trends, and performance metrics to identify opportunities for improvement and risk mitigation.
	Develop and implement financial strategies, plans, and policies to support business objectives and goals.
	Advise clients on financial planning, investment strategies, and wealth management to optimize financial performance and outcomes.
	Collaborate with internal teams, including finance, legal, and operations, to provide financial guidance and support for business initiatives and projects.
	Stay updated on accounting principles, regulations, and industry standards to ensure compliance and best practices.
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling activities to support decision-making and planning processes.
	Maintain accurate and organized financial records, documents, and databases.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor`s or Master's Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related fields
	Minimum experience of 8 years above.
	Certified Public Accountant (CPA) or Chartered Accountant (CA) designation.
	Proven experience in accounting, auditing, taxation, or financial advisory services.
	Strong understanding of accounting principles, financial reporting standards, and tax laws.
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to communicate complex financial concepts effectively to clients and stakeholders.
	Proficiency in accounting software, financial management tools, and Microsoft Office suite.
	Integrity and professionalism in handling confidential financial information and client relationships.
	Adaptability and willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and regulations.
	Attention to detail and accuracy in work.


Salary
N300,000 - N500,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: excellentjobs95@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted after the close of application.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Civil Engineer",
  "description": "Excellent Jobs is a consulting and recruitment firm, dedicated to hiring and managing great talents for its clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer&nbsp;
Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job brief


	We are looking for an innovative Civil Engineer to design, develop and construct a huge range of projects of the physically and naturally built environment from conception through to completion.


Responsibilities


	Manage, design, develop, create and maintain small-scale through to large-scale construction projects in a safe, timely and sustainable manner
	Conduct on site investigations and analyze data (maps, reports, tests, drawings and others)
	Carry out technical and feasibility studies and draw up blueprints that satisfy technical specifications
	Assess potential risks, materials and costs
	Provide advice and resolve creatively any emerging problems/deficiencies
	Oversee and mentor staff and liaise with a variety of stakeholders
	Handle over the resulting structures and services for use
	Monitor progress and compile reports in project status
	Manage budget and purchase equipment/materials
	Comply with guidelines and regulations including permits, safety etc and deliver technical files and other technical documentation as required.


Requirements and skills


	B.Sc / HND in Civil Engineering
	Must have a minimum of 3 years of working experience in civil engineering.
	License of professional engineer
	Excellent knowledge of design and visualizations software such as AutoCAD, Civil 3D or similar.
	Proficiency in site layout, grading, utility design, erosion control, regulatory approvals etc.
	Project management and supervision skills
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.


Salary
N400,000 per month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;excellentjobs95@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.",

Civil Engineer Job at Excellent Jobs




        
    

        
        Excellent Jobs is a consulting and recruitment firm, dedicated to hiring and managing great talents for its clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer 
Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job brief


	We are looking for an innovative Civil Engineer to design, develop and construct a huge range of projects of the physically and naturally built environment from conception through to completion.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage, design, develop, create and maintain small-scale through to large-scale construction projects in a safe, timely and sustainable manner
	Conduct on site investigations and analyze data (maps, reports, tests, drawings and others)
	Carry out technical and feasibility studies and draw up blueprints that satisfy technical specifications
	Assess potential risks, materials and costs
	Provide advice and resolve creatively any emerging problems/deficiencies
	Oversee and mentor staff and liaise with a variety of stakeholders
	Handle over the resulting structures and services for use
	Monitor progress and compile reports in project status
	Manage budget and purchase equipment/materials
	Comply with guidelines and regulations including permits, safety etc and deliver technical files and other technical documentation as required.


Requirements and skills


	B.Sc / HND in Civil Engineering
	Must have a minimum of 3 years of working experience in civil engineering.
	License of professional engineer
	Excellent knowledge of design and visualizations software such as AutoCAD, Civil 3D or similar.
	Proficiency in site layout, grading, utility design, erosion control, regulatory approvals etc.
	Project management and supervision skills
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.


Salary
N400,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: excellentjobs95@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Group Human Resources / Business Support Services Manager",
  "description": "Excellent Jobs is a consulting and recruitment firm, dedicated to hiring and managing great talents for its clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Group Human Resources / Business Support Services Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Develop and implement group-wide HR strategies, policies, and procedures in line with organizational objectives.
	Oversee talent acquisition, workforce planning, onboarding, and succession planning across all business units
	Drive performance management frameworks, ensuring clear KPIs, appraisals, and development plans.
	Champion employee engagement, recognition, and retention initiatives.
	Lead organizational development projects, including change management, culture building, and leadership development.
	Manage compensation &amp; benefits structures, ensuring internal equity and external competitiveness.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, regulations, and industry standards across jurisdictions
	Oversee administrative, facility management, and corporate support functions, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.
	Lead procurement and vendor management processes to optimize costs and efficiency.
	Manage travel, logistics, and corporate services support across business units.
	Develop and implement digital transformation initiatives within HR and support services for greater efficiency.
	Establish service-level agreements (SLAs) and key performance metrics for business support operations
	Act as a strategic partner to senior management, advising on workforce strategy, organizational design, and people-related risks.
	Drive cross-functional collaboration between HR, Finance, IT, and Operations to support overall business performance.
	Mentor and develop HR and support services teams, building capability and leadership pipelines.
	Contribute to business continuity planning, risk management and crisis response frameworks.
	Any other tasks that will be given to you from time to time by the Group&rsquo;s top management


Requirements


	Qualifications
	
		B.Sc Degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Industrial/Organizational Psychology or any related field. Master&#39;s Degree will be an added advantage.
		Minimum 12 years of consistent/progressive experience in a structured medium to large scale company with diverse businesses in Manufacturing, banking, real estate, Agro-business, Capital market, fintech etc.
		Must be between the Age ranges of 37 - 47years.
		Proficient in the use of Microsoft Packages e.g. Word, Excel, Sage or any other HR Software packages.
	
	
	Skills &amp; Competencies
	
		Strategic HR Management &amp; Workforce Planning
		Talent Acquisition &amp; Retention Strategies
		Organizational Development &amp; Change Management
		Compensation &amp; Benefits Structuring
		Employee Relations &amp; Compliance
		Business Support Operations &amp; Facilities Management
		Vendor &amp; Procurement Management
		Digital HR Solutions &amp; Process Automation Leadership, Coaching &amp; Team Development
	
	


Salary
N10,000,000 - N12,000,000 annually.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Cv and Cover letter to:&nbsp;excellentjobs95@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Group Human Resources / Business Support Services Manager Job at Excellent Jobs




        
    

        
        Excellent Jobs is a consulting and recruitment firm, dedicated to hiring and managing great talents for its clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Group Human Resources / Business Support Services Manager

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and implement group-wide HR strategies, policies, and procedures in line with organizational objectives.
	Oversee talent acquisition, workforce planning, onboarding, and succession planning across all business units
	Drive performance management frameworks, ensuring clear KPIs, appraisals, and development plans.
	Champion employee engagement, recognition, and retention initiatives.
	Lead organizational development projects, including change management, culture building, and leadership development.
	Manage compensation & benefits structures, ensuring internal equity and external competitiveness.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, regulations, and industry standards across jurisdictions
	Oversee administrative, facility management, and corporate support functions, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.
	Lead procurement and vendor management processes to optimize costs and efficiency.
	Manage travel, logistics, and corporate services support across business units.
	Develop and implement digital transformation initiatives within HR and support services for greater efficiency.
	Establish service-level agreements (SLAs) and key performance metrics for business support operations
	Act as a strategic partner to senior management, advising on workforce strategy, organizational design, and people-related risks.
	Drive cross-functional collaboration between HR, Finance, IT, and Operations to support overall business performance.
	Mentor and develop HR and support services teams, building capability and leadership pipelines.
	Contribute to business continuity planning, risk management and crisis response frameworks.
	Any other tasks that will be given to you from time to time by the Group’s top management


Requirements


	Qualifications
	
		B.Sc Degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Industrial/Organizational Psychology or any related field. Master's Degree will be an added advantage.
		Minimum 12 years of consistent/progressive experience in a structured medium to large scale company with diverse businesses in Manufacturing, banking, real estate, Agro-business, Capital market, fintech etc.
		Must be between the Age ranges of 37 - 47years.
		Proficient in the use of Microsoft Packages e.g. Word, Excel, Sage or any other HR Software packages.
	
	
	Skills & Competencies
	
		Strategic HR Management & Workforce Planning
		Talent Acquisition & Retention Strategies
		Organizational Development & Change Management
		Compensation & Benefits Structuring
		Employee Relations & Compliance
		Business Support Operations & Facilities Management
		Vendor & Procurement Management
		Digital HR Solutions & Process Automation Leadership, Coaching & Team Development
	
	


Salary
N10,000,000 - N12,000,000 annually.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Cv and Cover letter to: excellentjobs95@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Data Analyst",
  "description": "Maurice Xandra Solutions Limited - Our client is a leading organization dedicated to providing data-driven insights and solutions across various sectors in Nigeria and beyond.&nbsp;

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analyst
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our Client is looking for a detail-oriented and analytical Data Analyst to help the company make data-driven decisions. As a Data Analyst, you&#39;ll be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting complex data to inform business strategies.&nbsp;
	If you have a passion for data analysis and a keen eye for detail, we&#39;d love to hear from you.


Key Responsibilities


	Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret complex data from various sources to inform business decisions.
	Data Visualization: Create reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate insights and trends to stakeholders.
	Data Mining: Identify trends, patterns, and correlations within large datasets to inform business strategies.
	Data Quality: Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency by developing and implementing data quality checks.
	Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with stakeholders to understand business requirements and develop data-driven solutions.
	Ad-hoc Analysis: Perform ad-hoc analysis and provide insights to support business decisions.


Requirements


	Experience: 2+ years of experience in data analysis or a related field.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
	Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data.
	Communication Skills: Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to communicate insights to non-technical stakeholders.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@mauricexandra.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Data Analyst Job at Maurice Xandra Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        Maurice Xandra Solutions Limited - Our client is a leading organization dedicated to providing data-driven insights and solutions across various sectors in Nigeria and beyond. 

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analyst
Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our Client is looking for a detail-oriented and analytical Data Analyst to help the company make data-driven decisions. As a Data Analyst, you'll be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting complex data to inform business strategies. 
	If you have a passion for data analysis and a keen eye for detail, we'd love to hear from you.


Key Responsibilities


	Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret complex data from various sources to inform business decisions.
	Data Visualization: Create reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate insights and trends to stakeholders.
	Data Mining: Identify trends, patterns, and correlations within large datasets to inform business strategies.
	Data Quality: Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency by developing and implementing data quality checks.
	Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with stakeholders to understand business requirements and develop data-driven solutions.
	Ad-hoc Analysis: Perform ad-hoc analysis and provide insights to support business decisions.


Requirements


	Experience: 2+ years of experience in data analysis or a related field.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
	Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data.
	Communication Skills: Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to communicate insights to non-technical stakeholders.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@mauricexandra.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Telesale Officer (Female)",
  "description": "PC Place is a Nigerian retailer specializing in computers, electronics, and accessories, with both an online store and physical locations. The company&#39;s head office is located in Ikeja, Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Telesale Officer (Female)
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description:


	Lead Generation &amp; Customer Engagement: Actively identify and contact potential customers online and through phone to generate sales leads and build a client base.
	Product Expertise: Develop a thorough understanding of computer hardware, software, and peripherals to effectively communicate features, benefits, and technical specifications to customers.
	Sales &amp; Negotiation: Present products, answer customer questions, explain technical details, and negotiate prices and terms to secure sales.
	Customer Relationship Management: Maintain and grow profitable relationships with customers by providing excellent service, handling queries, and following up on leads and inquiries.
	Sales Target Achievement: Work independently or with a team to meet or exceed monthly or quarterly sales goals and drive revenue for the company.
	Market &amp; Trend Awareness: Stay informed about the latest technology trends, online marketing strategies, and competitor activities.
	Essential Skills &amp; Qualifications
	Communication &amp; Customer Service: Exceptional ability to communicate effectively through various digital platforms and provide outstanding customer service.
	Technical Aptitude: Basic to strong knowledge of computers, Hardware and related IT terminology.
	Sales &amp; Persuasion: Strong persuasion and negotiation skills to overcome objections and close deals.
	Organization &amp; Self-Motivation: Ability to manage multiple tasks, prioritize work, and remain self-motivated to achieve sales targets.
	Digital Tools Proficiency: Familiarity with online sales tools, CRM systems, and communication platforms (like email, chat, and phone).


Requirements


	Education: A high school diploma or GED is a minimum requirement, though degrees in business, marketing, or computer science can be beneficial.
	Experience: Telesale, Client Service, Customer Service, Sales


Salary
N150,000 per month (Good Bonus attached to the role).&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@pcplaceng.com&nbsp;or&nbsp;pcplaceng@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Telesale Officer (Female) Job at PC Place Nigeria




        
    

        
        PC Place is a Nigerian retailer specializing in computers, electronics, and accessories, with both an online store and physical locations. The company's head office is located in Ikeja, Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Telesale Officer (Female)
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Lead Generation & Customer Engagement: Actively identify and contact potential customers online and through phone to generate sales leads and build a client base.
	Product Expertise: Develop a thorough understanding of computer hardware, software, and peripherals to effectively communicate features, benefits, and technical specifications to customers.
	Sales & Negotiation: Present products, answer customer questions, explain technical details, and negotiate prices and terms to secure sales.
	Customer Relationship Management: Maintain and grow profitable relationships with customers by providing excellent service, handling queries, and following up on leads and inquiries.
	Sales Target Achievement: Work independently or with a team to meet or exceed monthly or quarterly sales goals and drive revenue for the company.
	Market & Trend Awareness: Stay informed about the latest technology trends, online marketing strategies, and competitor activities.
	Essential Skills & Qualifications
	Communication & Customer Service: Exceptional ability to communicate effectively through various digital platforms and provide outstanding customer service.
	Technical Aptitude: Basic to strong knowledge of computers, Hardware and related IT terminology.
	Sales & Persuasion: Strong persuasion and negotiation skills to overcome objections and close deals.
	Organization & Self-Motivation: Ability to manage multiple tasks, prioritize work, and remain self-motivated to achieve sales targets.
	Digital Tools Proficiency: Familiarity with online sales tools, CRM systems, and communication platforms (like email, chat, and phone).


Requirements


	Education: A high school diploma or GED is a minimum requirement, though degrees in business, marketing, or computer science can be beneficial.
	Experience: Telesale, Client Service, Customer Service, Sales


Salary
N150,000 per month (Good Bonus attached to the role). 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@pcplaceng.com or pcplaceng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
